go_data.justification: Talin 1 is localised to cardiac muscle intercalated discs and to the costamere.
Up-regulation of Talin 1 in the hearts of Fragile X autosomal homolog1 mutants is associated with disruption of costamere structure in heart muscle.
Increased cardiac load will increase Talin1 expression at costameres and Talin1 modifies the hypertrophic response to pressure overload.
